page.description: Application Launcher: Nothing else can be more direct.
Application Group: Drag and drop your favorite applications to create an App Group.
Show Desktop: Click the icon to minimize all opened windows and show desktop; click again to restore to previous layouts.
Notification Area:Notifications from instant messaging tools will prompt here.
Create shortcuts for applications: Shortcuts created will make your favorite applications more handy.
Switch users: Use arrow keys to switch between different users at login screen.
Guest login: Switch to guest account using arrow keys at login screen.
